text: hi <@U5SGFUU80> thank you for the information, looks very helpful and I will have a close look and see what I can do. I also talked to their support and they said is an issue on their end and they are trying to fix it.

will be great if the visibility control for fields in CM can be managed with field names instead field IDs (or both).
I am updating some CMs via FTP, and the new fields don't have any ID yet (if I am right, need to be created by HS?) so I can't set any visibility condition yet until I get the unique IDs.
example:
`"visibility" : {`
`  "controlling_field" : "field_name_here_instead_id",`
`  "controlling_value_regex" : "false",`
`  "operator" : null`
`},`

I think this is gonna be necessary for local dev. too :slightly_smiling_face:
The horizontal spacer module should default to not editable in page editor. <https://spin.d.pr/XDl42V+>
